name: The sandwich monster
description:
Is it a bird? Is a snake? Is it an alien monster?  Whatever it is... it's hungry and only eats jam sandwiches. Feed it!

  • Number of puzzles: 10
  • Average play time: 1h+
  • First published: January 2023
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.
  • Hackable source:  click here

puzzlescript implementation - Andrea Gilbert - 2023    
puzzle concept and designs - Andrea Gilbert - 2023
